name: balcon-builders
description: Root workspace for Bal-Con Builders full-stack app (backend + frontend)

scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:all: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.coverage: npm run test --workspace backend -- --coverage && npm run test --workspace frontend --if-present -- --coverage --watchAll=false
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:backend && npm run typecheck:frontend
